saitMLS.persistance

Class ClientBroker

  • java.lang.Object
    • saitMLS.persistance.ClientBroker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Broker

    public class ClientBroker
extends java.lang.Object
implements Broker
    ClientBroker.java
    Version:
    1.0 Class Description: ClientBroker class that reads in a list of clients from a text file and builds into a bin file. Contains back end functions for front end of SAIT MLS. Takes in user input to add or save to client bin file. Also allows user to search for clients.
    Author:
    Steven Ghantous

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeBroker()
      Method to close the random access file and null the reference to the Singleton Pattern object ClientBroker.
      static ClientBroker getClientBroker()
      Static method that is the completion of the Singleton Pattern and generates the single reference to the ClientBroker object by checking to see if it already exists in memory.
      boolean persist(java.lang.Object o)
      Method to add a Client object to the end of a RandomAccessFile.
      boolean remove(java.lang.Object o)
      Method to logically delete the supplied object from the RandomAccessFile by changing the active attribute from true to false to indicate the record has been deleted.
      List search(java.lang.Object o)
      Method to search Client database and return list of results

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getClientBroker

        public static ClientBroker getClientBroker()
        Static method that is the completion of the Singleton Pattern and generates the single reference to the ClientBroker object by checking to see if it already exists in memory. Also, checks to see if the binary file exists and if it doesn't load the text file of data into the binary file.
        Returns:
        the reference to the ClientBroker object.

      • persist

        public boolean persist(java.lang.Object o)
        Method to add a Client object to the end of a RandomAccessFile.
        Specified by:
        persist in interface Broker
        Parameters:
        c - the Client object being added
        Returns:
        true if the Client object is added and false if it isn't.

      • remove

        public boolean remove(java.lang.Object o)
        Method to logically delete the supplied object from the RandomAccessFile by changing the active attribute from true to false to indicate the record has been deleted.
        Specified by:
        remove in interface Broker
        Parameters:
        c - the Client object to be removed.
        Returns:
        true if the object is deleted and false if it isn't

      • closeBroker

        public void closeBroker()
        Method to close the random access file and null the reference to the Singleton Pattern object ClientBroker.
